name: Helicopter Mess 1.1
description:
Helicopter mess is a new really hard endless game. It's very similar to flappy bird, but now it's a helicopter! Your taps are limited to 30, but you can catch gas in your runs to go further. 

Try to get more then 100 high score, bet you can't!

This game was cancelled and it is very unlikely for new updates to it. It  is recommended to play the game on PC or something with a higher resolution since it is very hard to play on something like a phone, but the game supports that too for the people who are up for the challenge!
